text: Somogyvár is a Hungarian village located around half way between Lake Balaton and Kaposvár. In 2023 the population consisted of around 1698 residents. == Transport == The village has a small station which is located along line number 36 of Máv Hungarian railways. It is served by frequent trains to Kaposvár, Fonyód Györ, as well as Pécs during weekends. == References == Category:Villages in Hungary
title: Somogyvár
